document_data.name: Aureenar Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Aureenar Street'''<ref group="note">This street name is spelled "Aurenaar" on the ''[[Waterdeep: Dragon Heist]]'' map, but is spelled "Aureenar" in ''[[Volo's Guide to Waterdeep]]'', ''[[Blackstaff Tower (novel)|Blackstaff Tower]]'', and ''[[Downshadow (novel)|Downshadow]]'' and this wiki prioritizes printed text over map labels. was a minor, corduroy-log paved,<ref name=CoS.M" /> curved street in the northern tip of the [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].<ref name=CoS.M" />
document_data.Geography:
This street was situated south of the [[Street of Lances]] and curved parallel to it.<ref name=CoS.M" />

It ran from east to west, going down southwest off of [[Trollkill Street]] and intersecting [[Stormstar's Ride]]. Aureenar Street then gradually curved northwest, passing through [[Morningstar Way]], [[Murlpar Street]], and the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]], until finally terminating into [[Westwall Street]].<ref name=CoS.M" />

Along the way, [[Prayer Alley]] ran south off of Aureenar Street and a narrow passageway ran north from it into [[Shank Alley]].<ref name=CoS.M" />
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Demondraught]], a tavern on the corner of the intersection of Aureenar Street, Morningstar Way, and Stormstar's Ride.<ref>
